verses.verse: And <S%H935><s%>, behold, there came a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>: and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H4196>altar<s%>, <S%H4196>altar<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1121>Behold<s%>, a son shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>; and upon thee shall he <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> that burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon <S%H120>thee<s%>, and men's <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall they burn upon <S%H8313>thee<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H4159>sign<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H4159>sign<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: <S%H4196>Behold<s%>, the altar shall be <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> that are upon it shall be poured <S%H8210>out<s%>.

And it came to <S%H4428>pass<s%>, when the king <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which he <S%H7121>cried<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H3027>him<s%>. And his hand, which he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> against <S%H3001>him<s%>, dried up, so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not draw it back again to <S%H7725>him<s%>.

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> also was <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> poured <S%H8210>out<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, according to the <S%H4159>sign<s%> which the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H2470>Entreat<s%> now the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H3027>me<s%>, that my hand may be restored me <S%H7725>again<s%>. And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2470>entreated<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> was restored him <S%H7725>again<s%>, and became as it was <S%H7223>before<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with <S%H5582>me<s%>, and refresh <S%H5414>thyself<s%>, and I will give thee a <S%H4991>reward<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, If thou wilt <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2677>half<s%> thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, I will not go <S%H935>in<s%> with <S%H398>thee<s%>, neither will I eat <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>;

So he <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> not by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>.

Now there <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>; and one of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> him all the <S%H4639>works<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>: the <S%H1697>words<s%> which he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, them also they <S%H5608>told<s%> unto their <S%H1>father<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H2280>Saddle<s%> me the <S%H2543>ass<s%>. So they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> him the <S%H2543>ass<s%>; and he rode <S%H7392>thereon<s%>.

And he <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H3427>sitting<s%> under an <S%H424>oak<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, Art thou the man of <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H935>camest<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? Then he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Come <S%H1004>home<s%> with <S%H398>me<s%>, and eat <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7725>return<s%> with <S%H935>thee<s%>, nor go in with <S%H398>thee<s%>; neither will I eat <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> with thee in this <S%H4725>place<s%>:

for it was <S%H1697>said<s%> to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> no <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H7725>there<s%>, nor turn again to <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that thou <S%H1980>camest<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5030>him<s%>, I also am a prophet as thou <S%H4397>art<s%>; and an angel <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring him <S%H7725>back<s%> with thee into thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>. But he lied unto <S%H3584>him<s%>.
So he went <S%H7725>back<s%> with <S%H398>him<s%>, and did eat <S%H3899>bread<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.
And it came to <S%H3427>pass<s%>, as they sat at the <S%H7979>table<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that brought him <S%H7725>back<s%>;
